projects.name: E-Commerce Website
projects.description: This is a full responsive web application built using MERN tech stack (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, NodeJs, Redux tool, MongoDB). E-Commerce web application with Admin Panel, Redux Toolkit, Stripe Payment, Cloud Deployment, Email Invoice, and many features.

projects.name: Booking App(Airbnb Clone)
projects.description: This is a web application built using ReactJs, Express.js, Node.js, MongoDB that emulates the look and feel of the popular online marketplace for short- and long-term homestays platform, Airbnb. With a responsive design and carefully crafted UI, this clone offers users a familiar and engaging experience to the users. The web app offers users features such as users can know about their bookings, their accomodations, also the app require user authentication.

projects.name: Sorting Visualizer
projects.description: Sorting Visualizer is a web app for visualizing a bunch of different sorting algorithms like Selection Sort, Bubble Sort, Insertion Sort, Merge Sort, Quick Sort, Heap Sort. The web app provides a descriptive analysis in graphical format through which its easy to analyze the sorting sequence.

projects.name: Portfolio (HTML, CSS, JavaScript)
projects.description: With a keen eye for aesthetics and a focus on user-centric design, I have created engaging website, visually striking graphics, and compelling written content. Through my work, I showcase my ability to tackle challenges creatively and deliver results that exceeds expectations.

experiences.description: Gained valuable skills in communication, networking and Leadership.
